forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 55F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.
